name: Khoveri
content:
Jedi Master Khoveri was a Nautolan male Jedi Consular of the Jedi Order active during the ongoing struggle between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He sold clothing, including articles resembling his own attire, and other items to fellow Consulars near the entrance to the Senate Commercial District in the Senate Plaza on the Republic's capital planet, Coruscant. Among the items Khoveri sold were headgear, gloves, bracers, robes, boots, and lightsabers.
Khoveri had green skin and black eyes. He wore a white robe with a gold pattern, white boots, and a dark grey belt with gold circles on it. His head tendrils had brown bands on them, and a lightsaber hung from his belt. Khoveri greeted his customers in a language other than Galactic Basic.
Khoveri appeared as the Legacy vendor for the Jedi Consular class in the 2012 Game Update 1.2 for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, developed by BioWare and released in 2011.
